subject: Hockey, Ice
Olympic Games (2014)
lead_paragraph: Less than eight months before the Winter Olympics in Sochi, Russia, the N.H.L. has not reached agreement with Olympic officials to allow its players to participate in the Games, Commissioner Gary Bettman said.
snippet: Less than eight months before the Winter Olympics in Sochi, Russia, the N.H.L. has not reached agreement with Olympic officials to allow its players to participate in the Games, Commissioner Gary Bettman said.
